SEARCH
Module simulation.animal_simulation
Package simulation.animal_simulation.map.navigation

Class Coordinates

java.lang.Object
simulation.animal_simulation.map.navigation.Coordinates
public class Coordinates extends Object
The Coordinates class represents the coordinates of a location in the simulation. Each Coordinates object has an x and y value. The Coordinates class provides methods for checking if these coordinates are within a certain range of other coordinates, and for calculating the distance to other coordinates. The Coordinates class is responsible for managing the position of objects in the simulation.

      Constructor for the Coordinates class.
      Parameters:
      mapSize - The size of the map.

    • Coordinates

      public Coordinates(int x, int y, boolean areDirectCoordinates)
      Constructor for the Coordinates class.
      Parameters:
      x - The size of the map.
      y - The ID of the location on the map.
      areDirectCoordinates - True if the passed coordinates are direct coordinates, false if they are map size and id on map respectively, so they will be converted to direct coordinates.
